ARABIC: وَلَبِثُوا۟ فِى كَهْفِهِمْ ثَلَٰثَ مِا۟ئَةٍ سِنِينَ وَٱزْدَادُوا۟ تِسْعًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They stayed in their Cave for three hundred years and added nine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (It is said) they stayed in the cave three hundred years and nine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They remained in the Cave for three hundred years; and others added nine more years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They, in fact, stayed in the cave for three hundred plus nine further years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they stayed in their Cave for three hundred years* and nine more*. (* 300 according to the Solar calendar and 309 according to the Lunar calendar.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they stayed in their cave three hundred years, adding nine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they remained in their cave three hundred years and (some) add (another) nine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they tarried in the Cave three hundred years, and to that they added nine more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (it is said) they tarried in their Cave three hundred years and add nine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [Some say], "They stayed in their cave three hundred years," and to that some have added another nine years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they tarried in their cave three hundred years and added nine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They remained in the Cave for three hundred years, and added nine more [to that number].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they stayed in their Cave three hundred years, and (some) add nine (more)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they stayed in their Cave three hundred (solar) years, and add nine (for lunar years).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they stayed in the Cave three hundred years and to that they added nine more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they stayed in their cave for three hundred years, adding nine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they remained in their cave for three hundred years and exceeded by nine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:25] And they tarried in the Cave three hundred (read [with tanwīn] thalāthami’atin) years (sinīn is an explicative supplement to thalāthami’atin, ‘three hundred’): these three hundred years in the case of the People of the Cave were solar years; but for [the number of] lunar ones, the Arabs add nine years thereto, and this is mentioned in His saying: and add nine, that is, nine years; in other words three hundred solar years, while three hundred and nine lunar ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (it is said) they tarried in their Cave three hundred years and add nine) before Allah made them wake up.
